scripts.watch-js: watchify -v -e src/client/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] --debug -o build/bundle.js
scripts.build-js: NODE_ENV=production browserify -v -e src/client/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -o build/tmp.js
scripts.build-js-dev: browserify -v -e src/client/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -o build/bundle.js
